VectorDataTransform
Apply a transform to each vertex of the input VectorData
Vector Data Manipulation
QgsProcessingParameterVectorLayer|vd|Input Vector data|-1|None|False
QgsProcessingParameterVectorDestination|out|Output Vector data|-1|None|False
QgsProcessingParameterRasterLayer|in|Support image|None|False
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|transform.tx|X Translation|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Double|0|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|transform.ty|Y Translation|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Double|0|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|transform.ro|Rotation Angle|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Double|0|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|transform.centerx|Center X|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Double|0|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|transform.centery|Center Y|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Double|0|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|transform.scale|Scale|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Double|1|True
